summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LegalCore system. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend RTL Arabic interface working well with minor UI interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Button click intercepted by sidebar overlay element
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents adding new cases through UI (API works fine)

integration_issues.issue: Direct navigation to /ai-assistant redirects to dashboard instead of AI Assistant page
integration_issues.impact: Can access AI Assistant through sidebar navigation

passed_tests: Backend API - All 14 endpoints working (100% success)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix sidebar overlay issue preventing Add Case button clicks. Consider adjusting z-index or click event handling for modal triggers.
